name: Hip Hop Blocks
description:
Do you love hip hop? How about puzzles? Well if you do you'll find Hip Hop Blocks extremely fun! We've created a unique puzzle experience combined with our love for hip hop for you to enjoy.

Simple Objective: Money = Points!

All you have to do is match 4 of the same hip hop blocks to form a square to earn money/points! But beware, some blocks get locked after a period of time to give you the ultimate challenge.

You can also get 6 blocks vertical, horizontal, or diagonal to earn money/points and 4 blocks on board corners.

Sometimes you are rewarded with special blocks. Time freezes, bonus blocks, and unlock blocks.

So are you ready for the ultimate hip hop puzzle challenge? Let's see how much money you can earn! Then share your results with your friends threw Game Center!

Think, Plot, Turn-up!

Support: iTrapApps.com
